result.title: Report on the suitability of the actual reference data sets for deep Argo DMQC
result.description: Report on the suitability of the actual reference data sets for deep Argo DMQC This report will state if the actual reference data set used in the core Argo array is appropriate for the deep Argo extension If it is not appropriate the report will include the necessary requirements NOC IEO IFREMER OGS
